sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container,Row,Col,Form,ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg" const TourDetails = () => { const {id }= useParams() //this is an static data for API N Data base const tour= tourData.find(tour=> tour.id===id ) const{photo,title,desc,price,reviews,address,city,distance,maxGroupSize} = tour ; const{totalRating,avgRating}=calculateAvgRating(reviews); const options={day : "numeric",month: "long", year: "numeric"}; return <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating=== 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ("Not rated") : ( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city } ${price } /per person {maxGroupSize }
Description

{desc}

{/*============== tour review section ============== */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews?.map(reviews=> (
Pranta

{new Date("12-1-2024").toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

5
) ) }
{/*============== tour review section end ============== */}
} export default TourDetails
